thread.title: Bucs Social Media: Social media reacts to Tampa Bay‚Äôs NFC South win
thread.title_full: Bucs Social Media: Social media reacts to Tampa Bay‚Äôs NFC South win

author: River Wells
title: Bucs Social Media: Social media reacts to Tampa Bay‚Äôs NFC South win
text:
It was a year full of ups and downs, but now, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers are NFC South champions.
The team clinched the division with a win over the Carolina Panthers on Sunday, and although it was a rough 9-0 victory, it was exactly what Tampa Bay needed to go to the playoffs. This is the fourth year in a row the Bucs are headed to the playoffs and the third year in a row they clinched the NFC South, and of course, Bucs fans had a lot to say about it ‚Äî and they brought receipts from the beginning of the year.
Here is what Bucs fans and neutral observers had to say after the game:
Bucs were pretty bad today. Multiple dropped INTs by Panthers. Panthers fumble at inch yard line. Have Panthers TD called back by a formation penalty that had nothing to do with play. Missed Panthers FG.
Found a way though. Back to the playoffs again. Happy for Bucs fans.
‚Äî Jon Ledyard (@LedyardNFLDraft) January 7, 2024
0-0 Go Bucs!
‚Äî Dave Canales (@DcoachCanales) January 7, 2024
Winfield has saved the Bucs 10 points today
‚Äî Jon Ledyard (@LedyardNFLDraft) January 7, 2024
‚ÄúYou must be on crack if you think the Bucs will somehow sneak into the Super Bowl and win it all‚Äù
Me: pic.twitter.com/kJENa0bAPt
‚Äî ùóóùóù (@DJBucsFan) January 7, 2024
Baker Mayfield:
‚Äì Browns dump him after winning a playoff game, trade him to Panthers
‚Äì Panthers dump him after not even a full season on terrible roster, Rams claim him
‚Äì Rams claim him, plays well in short run in LA
‚Äì Bucs sign him, leads team to division title
Amazing pic.twitter.com/ZkVCuj9fT4
‚Äî Josh Callaway (@JoshMCallaway) January 7, 2024
Baker took the Winless Browns to the playoffs and now the Brady-less Bucs to the playoffs.
Dude is a true competitor
‚Äî Will Blackmon üç∑ (@WillBlackmon) January 7, 2024
NFC SOUTH CHAMPS AGAIN BABY! pic.twitter.com/iQivavS6LY
‚Äî ‚Ä¢ Christie ‚Ä¢ ‚ù§Ô∏è (@AllAboutBucs) January 7, 2024
Congrats to Baker Mayfield for leading the Bucs to the playoffs replacing the GOAT. It wasn't pretty, but it was 9-0. I give the Bucs a good shot of winning a home playoff game against the Eagles.
‚Äî Skip Bayless (@RealSkipBayless) January 7, 2024
‚ÄúBucs are tanking‚Ä¶‚Äù
‚ÄúLol, from Brady to Baker Mayfield‚Ä¶‚Äù
‚ÄúTampa Bay will go back to who they were before‚Ä¶‚Äù
‚ÄúSecond-worst team in the league‚Ä¶‚Äù pic.twitter.com/D361jablmE
‚Äî Josh Hill (@jdavhill) January 7, 2024
NFC SOUTH THREE-PEAT
FOUR-STRAIGHT PLAYOFF APPEARANCES
THE. MF'N. BUCS. pic.twitter.com/YkK4pdwx0I
‚Äî Rays The Roof (@RaysTheRoofTB) January 7, 2024
This offseason, #Bucs were a trendy selection as one of the league's worst teams in various power rankings.
"It's nuts," Tristan Wirfs said. "We've got a lot of great players still‚Ä¶We lost one guy."
Todd Bowles and the Bucs finish with nine wins and the NFC South crown.
‚Äî Jeremy Fowler (@JFowlerESPN) January 7, 2024
Todd Bowles seems more relieved than happy.
‚Äî JoeBucsFan (@JoeBucsFan) January 7, 2024
2 yrs ago it looked like Baker Mayfield was gonna get a huge 2nd contract
1 yr ago the Browns dumped him to chase Deshaun Watson & Panthers rolled the dice on him
9 months ago the Bucs signed him for cheap BACKUP $ to start, he was such damaged goods
Dude just took them to the‚Ä¶
‚Äî Sam Monson (@PFF_Sam) January 7, 2024
BUCS ARE DIVISION CHAMPS FOR A THIRD STRAIGHT SEASON! üî•
Franchise record & 4th consecutive season with a playoff appearance. üëÄ
In a year with the media predicting us as a bottom feeder, just flat out awesome stuff ü´° ‚úåüèª
Draft watchers can put their calculators away for‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/4oaT9XoBKb

Antoine Winfield Jr is single handedly saving the Bucs season

Great job by Todd Bowles leading Bucs to 3rd straight NFC South title after team essentially punted offseason to clean up cap issues. Talk about leading and maximizing a roster. pic.twitter.com/93pNWowIrl
‚Äî Cameron Wolfe (@CameronWolfe) January 7, 2024
The Yaya Diaby and Calijah Kancey sack celebration has been a Top-5 development in the Bucs 2023-24 season.

TODAY, BAKER MAYFIELD GOT IT DONE üò§ pic.twitter.com/CwiwJcylad

BAKER MAYFIELD AND THE TB BUCS ARE NFC SOUTH CHAMPS AND HEADING TO THE PLAYOFFS ü•≥ü•≥
Not bad after taking over for the GOATüòåüòå #GoBucs pic.twitter.com/WoopQvGVsB

Even if the Bucs win today, Bowles shouldn't be safe. They had a four game winning streak but then two playoff lock games against division opponents (in a trash division) and they look like a high school team
‚Äî Chris (@CynicalBucsFan) January 7, 2024
Don't care how ugly this is today. Winning is the only standard for this one. If anything, a lackluster performance now makes a good performance next week even more likely.
That said, the Bucs' actual health most certainly matters. Hope Mayfield feels better with another week.
‚Äî Bobby Fenton (@bobbygameday) January 7, 2024
The MVP for the #Bucs is GM Jason Licht. He built what he could, with no money. The team was supposed to lose just about every game but won 9.

‚ÄúBucs 2-15‚Äù
‚ÄúBucs aren‚Äôt nothing without Brady‚Äù

Us with another Playoff berth
pic.twitter.com/m3vUZ1c4mv

They told me the Bucs would be at the bottom of the division before the season started LMFAOOOO
